amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for USDA nutrition programs for the elderly by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the bill's funding for USDA's Nutrition Program for the Elderly by $20 million. The offset for this amount comes from Foreign Assistance funds (P.L. 480, Title II.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
